generated_doNotEdit.title: Map Color
generated_doNotEdit.description: Sets the color of the block when rendered to a map. If this component is omitted, the block will not show up on the map.

fields.title: Color
fields.description: The color is represented as a hex value in the format "#RRGGBB". May also be expressed as an array of [R, G, B] from 0 to 255.

fields.title: Tint Method
fields.description: Optional, tint multiplied to the color. Tint method logic varies, but often refers to the "rain" and "temperature" of the biome the block is placed in to compute the tint. Supported tint methods are "none", "default_foliage", "birch_foliage", "evergreen_foliage", "dry_foliage", "grass" and "water"
